instrucciones: To manage secure operations, you need to import the company credential to the wallet.
This credential contains verifiable information about your company, such as Tax ID, legal representative and banking details.
Below we detail the process, it's very simple.

bloques.titulo: Add it to Your Wallet App
instrucciones: Open the wallet application you have installed.
Look for the "Add" or "Import Credential" option.
Scan this QR code that will be provided to you with your mobile camera.
That easy, the company credential is added to your wallet, ready to perform secure operations.
